sense.def:
To wallow in an unpleasant situation or feeling
pomeni dovoliti, da neprijetne okoliščine ali čustvo trajajo dlje, kot je razumno ali treba.

seg.quote: At first I just wanted to wallow in misery.
Her mother was wallowing in widowhood.

sense.def:
Kadar neka žival
wallows in mud or water
, leži ali se počasi obrača v vodi ali blatu.
